title: Behind the Scenes Minis: The Bubble and Mr. Moms
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: The Bubble and Mr. Moms
description:
Tracy and Holly discuss the difficulty in examining sociological texts as part of research. They also recount their first encounters with the work of Moms Mabley, and her incredible timing in telling jokes that were often incredibly daring for their time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
